snippet: Specialist Ivan Antonio Lopez, who shot almost 20 fellow soldiers, had been denied leave by his superiors, a law enforcement official said.
abstract: Law enforcement official reveals that Specialist Ivan Lopez had an angry dispute over a leave request shortly before shooting rampage that killed three and wounded 16 at Fort Hood; also confirms that Lopez became angry with soldiers from his unit before the attack.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Elivan Martinez in San Juan, P.R.; Alan Blinder from Killeen; and Joseph Goldstein and Rick Lyman from New York.

lead_paragraph: Specialist Ivan Antonio Lopez, who shot almost 20 fellow soldiers, had been denied leave by his superiors, a law enforcement official said.
